GeneralAccurateOCR.document: This example shows you how to detect and recognize characters in an image as a whole, where the text box positions and characters are returned.
GeneralAccurateOCR.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ocr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GeneralAccurateOCR
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ImageUrl": "https://xx/a.jpg"
}
GeneralAccurateOCR.title: Recognizing general print (high-precision) ([debugging tool](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/api/explorer?Product=ocr&Action=GeneralAccurateOCR))
